Test Name: Gabapentin Analysis in Umbilical Cord Tissue
Purpose: To quantify gabapentin concentrations in umbilical cord tissue with accuracy, precision, and reliability.
Container: 15 mL centrifuge tube (initial homogenization) and 2 mL screw cap tube (extraction)
Equipment: HPLC-MS/MS system, analytical balance, centrifuge, micropipettes, vortex mixer, water bath/heating block, ultrasonic bath
